did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: University of the State of New York. Bureau of Health and Human Services records, 1987-1995.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Bureau of Health and Human Services.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, reports, publications, curriculum material, newspaper clippings, photographs, and videotapes.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, reports, publications, curriculum material, newspaper clippings, photographs, and videotapes concerning the Bureau of Health and Human Services and vocational and family life issues, collected by the former Supervisor Sarah E. Hall.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: In 1987 the Bureau of Home Economics Education was renamed the Bureau of Health and Human Services.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, reports, publications, curriculum material, newspaper clippings, photographs, and videotapes concerning the Bureau of Health and Human Services and vocational and family life issues, collected by the former Supervisor Sarah E. Hall.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Bureau of Health and Human Services.
University of the State of New York Bureau of Home Economics Education.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: University of the State of New York Bureau of Health and Human Services records, #6521. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Home and Career Skills curriculum material, programs done at New York City high schools, Association of Home Economics Teachers of New York City files
Home and Career Skills curriculum material, resource material used by teachers on such topics as gender equality, vocational guidance, curriculum
Home and Career Skills curriculum material, lesson plans, videos and a banner
Resource material used by New York City high school teachers
Home and Career Skills curriculum material, resource material
Curriculum programs on such topics as adolescence, parenting, fashion, consumer affairs, early childhood and special education
Future Homemakers of America material, conference material and educational program files, such as bilingual education
Home and Career Skills curriculum material, gender equity files
Conference and meeting material and curriculum guides
